description: Is it possible to have a hangover from a year? Doctors are prescribing medical eggs to patients with mysterious headaches and nausea.
name: 2020 Hangover
I Have a Dream
description: As recent the battle for civil rights may be, we none the less must look back to understand our present.
With heat waves sweeping the southwest, Air Conditioners are running non stop, more fuel is needed for Fusion reactors!
name: Air Conditioning

description: A mysterious investor is looking for a lot of edible eggs. But he wants 10 quadrillion or nothing.
name: All or Nothing
LEGACY: All or Nothing
description: A mysterious investor is looking for a lot of edible eggs. But he wants the full amount or nothing.
The Amazon Rainforest continues to burn at unprecedented levels, waterballoon eggs are needed! Auxbrain, Inc has donated to the Rainforest Alliance to help.
name: Help The Amazon
Egg Day 2018
description: Some folks like to celebrate Egg Day with a bang!
Some folks like to celebrate Egg Day with a bang!

description: July 14 is Egg Day around the galaxy and everyone like to celebrate with the egg that started it all...

description: July 14 (2018) is Egg Day around the galaxy and everyone like to celebrate with the egg that started it all...

description: A new school year and political turmoil have everyone stressed out! A regimen of medical eggs are needed.

description: A new school year and political turmoil have everyone stressed out! A regimen of medical eggs are needed.

April Fool
description: A tech company's April Fools jokes went too far causing trillions in damages. Let's go back in time and stop the bad jokes!
Recently returned interplanetary artifacts posses mysterious properties, archeologists are trying to restore them to see what power they might possess
name: Restoration
Arts and Crafts
description: Kids are completing more arts and crafts projects than ever, we need more supplies!
Fires in Australia have reached historic size and devastation, Waterballoon eggs are needed! Auxbrain, Inc. has donated to the Australian Red Cross to help.
name: Help Australia
Back To School
description: Back-to-school students are in need of a refresher, Teachers need tachyon eggs to send kinds back in time to review material they forgot over summer. Shout out to Mrs. Paz!
Back-to-school students are in need of a refresher, Teachers need tachyon eggs to send kinds back in time to review material they forgot over summer.
name: Back To School

description: Heralded as 'Time Tourism for the masses', the new Tachyon Tube allows viewing of historical events from the comfort of your living room.
name: Tachyon Tube

description: Bluetooth enabled pigs are the new hot pet! Neuro-implant makers need more materials!
name: Bluetooth Pigs

description: With the discovery of new Boosts, farmers are quickly moving to pricier eggs leading to a scarcity of Edible Eggs, we need your help!
name: Edible Shortage

description: You've decided to build a new house! Why not make it yourself? You'll need a lot of eggs so get started!

description: You've decided to build a new house! Why not make it yourself? You'll need a lot of eggs so get started!

Cinco de Mayo celebrators partied a little too hard and have depleted pain killer supplies, time to restock!

description: Crypto currency mining energy use is out of control! Good thing we have a virtually unlimited source of clean energy now.

description: For an unknown reason chocolate won't stay on the shelves, help meet the high demand!

description: The word races to contain and support the outbreak of a new virus. Get the facts from your local government health agency (eg. cdc.gov)

description: As drought wreaks havoc on agriculture, farmers are looking for water in unusual places...

With so many planned easter eggs hunts around the galaxy, there is a shortage. We need your help!

description: We heard you are open to contract work! Help fill this order from the local pharmacy!
